channel.title: maGaming RSS Feed - gematsu_com
channel.description: A cleaned-up version of the original gaming feed for gematsu_com

item.title: Open Forum #345
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/open-forum-345

Open, off-topic discussion.

Welcome to the Open Forum, your domain to discuss (almost) anything and everything.

The usual community guidelines still apply. Please also take careful note of the following:

  • No nudity.
  • Not safe for work content needs to be posted with spoiler tags.
  • No trolling or spamming.

Please flag any comment that does not follow these rules.

Thank you!
